Node.definition: = state in which a countable entity is one in number
see רָמַתַיִם צֹופִים (רָמָתַיִם צֹופִים)|= town, also known as Ramah (רָמָה) ◄ territory of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם)
= an area dominated by elevations of the earth's surface
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of Joseph (יֹוסֵף) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= man; ◄ son of Jeroham (יְרֹחָם) ► husband of Hannah (חַנָּה) and Peninnah (פְּנִנָּה) father of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל) ancestor of Heman (הֵימָן)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► father of Elkanah (אֶלְקָנָה) ancestor of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל) Heman (הֵימָן)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man, also known as Eliab (אֱלִיאָב) and Eliel (אֱלִיאֵל) ◄ descendant of Elkanah (אֶלְקָנָה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► ancestor of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל) and Heman (הֵימָן)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man, also known as Toah (תֹּוחַ) and Nahath (נַחַת) ◄ son of Zuph (צוּף) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► ancestor of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man, also known as Zophai (צֹופַי) ◄ son of Elkanah (אֶלְקָנָה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► ancestor of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל)
= member of tribe of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם)
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= state in which a countable entity is the first in a range
= woman; ► wife of Elkanah (אֶלְקָנָה) mother of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל) co wife of Peninnah (פְּנִנָּה)
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= state in which a countable entity is the second in a range
= woman; ► wife of Elkanah (אֶלְקָנָה) co wife of Hannah (חַנָּה) mother of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל)
= woman; ► wife of Elkanah (אֶלְקָנָה) co wife of Hannah (חַנָּה) mother of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל)
= posterity of humans and or animals of undetermined sex, at an age ranging from before birth to adulthood
= woman; ► wife of Elkanah (אֶלְקָנָה) mother of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל) co wife of Peninnah (פְּנִנָּה)

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= posterity of humans and or animals of undetermined sex, at an age ranging from before birth to adulthood

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
literally: from days to days; hence: = process by which an event is repeated each year
literally: from days to days; hence: = process by which an event is repeated each year
= action by which humans lay themselves down on the ground in front of another human or a deity, ► as an act of submission or respect

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior
= town; ◄ territory of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) ► location of Tent of Meeting for some time
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► priest (כֹּהֵן) time of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל)
= man; ◄ son of Eli (עֵלִי) brother of Phinehas (פִּינְחָס) ► priest (כֹּהֵן) during time of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל)
= man; ◄ son of Eli (עֵלִי) brother of Hophni (חָפְנִי) ► priest (כֹּהֵן) during time of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל)
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense
= man; ◄ son of Jeroham (יְרֹחָם) ► husband of Hannah (חַנָּה) and Peninnah (פְּנִנָּה) father of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל) ancestor of Heman (הֵימָן)
= woman; ► wife of Elkanah (אֶלְקָנָה) co wife of Hannah (חַנָּה) mother of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל)
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
= woman; ► wife of Elkanah (אֶלְקָנָה) mother of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל) co wife of Peninnah (פְּנִנָּה)
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
read אַפַּיִם כִּי as אֶפֶס כִּי; see אֶפֶס (אֶפֶס)|particle connecting two propositions and denoting that Y limits the expectations that were evoked by X

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= woman; ► wife of Elkanah (אֶלְקָנָה) mother of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל) co wife of Peninnah (פְּנִנָּה)
= state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which humans close the entrance(s) to a location, supposedly by shutting its doors (דֶּלֶת)

= part of the lower body of women and mammals where offspring are conceived and in which they grow until their birth; ≈ sometimes extended to refer to a woman, the time of birth, the place where something is produced, and the innermost part of an area

Node.gloss: to trouble|to vex|to provoke to anger
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause other humans or deities to experience displeasure ◄ by their words or behavior
= woman who shares a husband with another woman; ► which can be a source of trouble and contention

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= causative action by which humans cause (other) humans or deities to experience displeasure ◄ by their words or behavior
= particle linking two propositions X and Y, by which Y represents the purpose or result of X
= causative action by which humans close the entrance(s) to a location, supposedly by shutting its doors (דֶּלֶת)
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= path through which a certain entity can be accessed, which can vary from a relatively narrow opening on one side to the entire surrounding space

= part of the lower body of women and mammals where offspring are conceived and in which they grow until their birth; ≈ sometimes extended to refer to a woman, the time of birth, the place where something is produced, and the innermost part of an area
literally: to be done; hence: = process by which certain events take place without observers always having a clear understanding of who is the agent
linker denoting a habitual circumstantial relationship between two events

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to trouble|to vex|to provoke to anger
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause other humans or deities to experience displeasure ◄ by their words or behavior

Node.gloss: to cry|to weep|to lament|to mourn|to bewail
Node.definition: = action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ◄ son of Jeroham (יְרֹחָם) ► husband of Hannah (חַנָּה) and Peninnah (פְּנִנָּה) father of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל) ancestor of Heman (הֵימָן)
= woman; ► wife of Elkanah (אֶלְקָנָה) mother of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל) co wife of Peninnah (פְּנִנָּה)

Node.gloss: to cry|to weep|to lament|to mourn|to bewail
Node.definition: = action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
literally: (one's) heart is bad; hence: = state in which humans feel distressed or miserable about a particular situation
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= woman; ► wife of Elkanah (אֶלְקָנָה) mother of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל) co wife of Peninnah (פְּנִנָּה)
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X takes place after Y has ceased existing or has been completed
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= town; ◄ territory of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) ► location of Tent of Meeting for some time
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X takes place after Y has ceased existing or has been completed
= man; ► priest (כֹּהֵן) time of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל)
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity
= large elaborate seat used by people in a position of authority or wealth
= upright part of a door frame; a few passages mention square door frames and in such cases the horizontal elements are also referred to as doorposts
= a reference to the main building of a temple, to be distinguished from the surrounding court and other constructions around it
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
literally: bitter; hence: = state in which humans are in deep distress

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to cry|to weep|to lament|to mourn|to bewail
Node.definition: = action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person

Node.gloss: to cry|to weep|to lament|to mourn|to bewail
Node.definition: = action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person

Node.gloss: to make a vow|to solemnly promise
Node.definition: = action by which humans make a solemn promise to a deity ► to signal a commitment to perform a certain act or behave in a specific way, usually in return for a blessing from the deity
= action by which humans make a solemn promise to a deity, ► which signals a commitment to perform a certain act or behave in a specific way, usually in return for a blessing from the deity

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
literally: to be bowed down; hence: = state in which humans are suffering hardship and trouble and unable to help themselves

= woman who is the legal property of someone else; either married or eligible for marriage; her children belong to the person who owns her; ≈ because of this an אָמָה appears to have a somewhat higher status than a שִׁפְחָה even though both terms are sometimes used interchangeably

Node.gloss: to remember|to call to mind|to be mindful|to bear in mind|to consider
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities reprocess information that is stored in their mind

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= woman who is the legal property of someone else; either married or eligible for marriage; her children belong to the person who owns her; ≈ because of this an אָמָה appears to have a somewhat higher status than a שִׁפְחָה even though both terms are sometimes used interchangeably

= woman who is the legal property of someone else; either married or eligible for marriage; her children belong to the person who owns her; ≈ because of this an אָמָה appears to have a somewhat higher status than a שִׁפְחָה even though both terms are sometimes used interchangeably
= a person’s child or children, or the young of an animal
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time

= the state of being alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= sharp knife ► used to shave hair from the skin
literally: to go up; hence: = process by which an object appears on top of or over another one

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= man; ► priest (כֹּהֵן) time of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל)
= action by which humans or deities carefully observe an object or event for a longer period of time

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
= woman; ► wife of Elkanah (אֶלְקָנָה) mother of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל) co wife of Peninnah (פְּנִנָּה)
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= to hold the opinion that a particular object, person, or event is to be identified with, considered similar to, or to be equated with another object, person, or event
= man; ► priest (כֹּהֵן) time of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל)
= state in which humans are intoxicated ◄ as a result of having had too much alcohol

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ► priest (כֹּהֵן) time of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל)
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y

= reference to an unknown point in time; ► normally used with the purpose of finding out which point in time is intended; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that this point of time may never arrive

Node.gloss: to make a drunken spectacle of oneself
Node.definition: = action by which humans are intoxicated ◄ as a result of having had too much alcohol ► and act accordingly

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= woman; ► wife of Elkanah (אֶלְקָנָה) mother of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל) co wife of Peninnah (פְּנִנָּה)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
literally: hard in spirit; hence: = state in which humans are experiencing deep sorrow
= inner person of a human or celestial being, associated with emotions, such as joy, grief, worry, courage, anger, willingness, etc.
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex

= alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of dates through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness

Node.gloss: to pour out (one's) heart|to pour out (one's) soul
Node.definition: literally: to pour out (one's) inner person (before someone else); hence: = to communicate one's thoughts and emotions to someone else

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= woman who is the legal property of someone else; either married or eligible for marriage; her children belong to the person who owns her; ≈ because of this an אָמָה appears to have a somewhat higher status than a שִׁפְחָה even though both terms are sometimes used interchangeably
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

possible literal meaning: without benefit or without success; hence: = state in which someone is considered an objectional human being who is engaged in evil behavior and does not contribute to the society in a positive way
= state in which human experience displeasure, which is said to reside in their heart (לֵב) ◄ and is caused by their own condition or by someone else

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= man; ► priest (כֹּהֵן) time of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= action by which humans experience a desire for something to happen and communicate this to (other) humans or deities in the hope that they will intenvene on their behalf
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: to find favor; hence: = state in which humans find the approval of deities or (other) humans
= state in which humans have a positive and compassionate attitude towards other humans

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
literally: road; hence: = action by which humans are travelling from one place to another
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= first half of the day, ranging from daybreak until noon; ≈ used figuratively to denote relief after a time of suffering, and associated with good as opposed to evil
= action by which humans lay themselves down on the ground in front of another human or a deity, ► as an act of submission or respect
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= town, also known as Ramathaim Zophim (רָמָתַיִם צֹופִים) ◄ territory of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) ► residence of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל)
literally: to know (someone physically); hence: = action by which two people have sexual relations with one another
= man; ◄ son of Jeroham (יְרֹחָם) ► husband of Hannah (חַנָּה) and Peninnah (פְּנִנָּה) father of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל) ancestor of Heman (הֵימָן)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= process by which females among humans or animals give birth to offspring through the process of conception, pregnancy, and labor; ≈ sometimes associated with painful toil and anxiety
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
literally: to cry out (someone's) name (something); hence: = action by which humans assign a name to a person or place

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= to accustom an infant to food other than its mother's milk

Node.gloss: to be seen|to become visible|to appear

particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus

= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= state in which humans remain in a place that is not their home for a relatively short time
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= to accustom an infant to food other than its mother's milk

= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
= to accustom an infant to food other than its mother's milk
= young male bovine; ► clean, used as sacrifice; ≈ associated with power and strength, but also with violence and aggression and therefore often used to denote people who behave as such
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
= a unit of dry measure of which the exact quantity is unknown and ranges between 20 and 40 liters; one ephah equals 10 omer (עֹמֶר)
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= flour made from ground grain kernels, ► used for baking bread, as ingredient for food, and as grain offering
= container ◄ made of a goatskin, the outer side of which has been turned inside; ► used for storing wine

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= town; ◄ territory of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) ► location of Tent of Meeting for some time

= formula for initiating a polite request to someone who is of a superior status
= man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer

= state in which humans and deities are alive and well, ◄ which, for humans, requires the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= state in which humans, deities or animals place themselves in a certain location in an upright position
